metadata.title: CVE-2024-27280 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer-overread issue was discovered in StringIO 3.0.1, as distributed inRuby 3.0.x through 3.0.6 and 3.1.x through 3.1.4. The ungetbyte and ungetcmethods on a StringIO can read past the end of a string, and a subsequentcall to StringIO.gets may return the memory value. 3.0.3 is the main fixedversion; however, for Ruby 3.0 users, a fixed version is stringio 3.0.1.1,and for Ruby 3.1 users, a fixed version is stringio 3.0.1.2.

criterions.comment: ruby3.1 package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
jruby package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
